## Description
 Create defatted soy flour by cracking, screening, heating soybean &#10;&#9;&#9;at 130 deg C with hot extrusion and high pressure .

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Skill Level:|2|
|Tech Level:|1|
|Process Time:|300.0 millisols|
|Work Level:|50.0 millisols|
|Power Required:|0.25 kW/hr|
